markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Golden Spur](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1586)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a firearm or crossbow

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>command</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You hit a target within 120 feet with the affixed weapon

**Requirement** You're a master in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10), [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11), or [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13).
</row>

</column>

---

This _golden spur_ is affixed to a weapon by a braided leather cord. You teleport to a space you can see within 10 feet of the target. You must have line of effect to the space.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Golden Spur
requirement: You're a master in  Arcana ,  Nature ,  Occultism , or  Religion .
